page.title: 14Herrisons Hospital's Future
page.content: At present the Mental Illness Unit is providing a full Psychiatric Service to both West and East Dorset. However, in the future, as Mental Illness Services develop in East Dorset, it will provide a service to patients within the geographical area of West Dorset. Over the last hundred years, Herrsion Hospital has been extended, and today it consists of a large complex group of buildings. It is quite possible that over the next ten years or so, many of these buildings will be closed.One of the main reasons for this appears to be the changing attitudes towards the mentally ill. Until recently they were drawn from a large area to a central site, but now, whenever possible, former patients are e4ing encouraged to live more normal lives in the local community.
